statements: DELETE FROM property_distribution WHERE property_type = 'House' AND property_count > 5;
DELETE FROM reports WHERE property_id IN (SELECT property_id FROM properties WHERE property_name = 'Apartment A');
DELETE FROM reports WHERE portfolio_id = 10 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM property_portfolio_mapping WHERE property_id = 101 AND portfolio_id = 201;
DELETE FROM properties WHERE id IN (SELECT property_id FROM property_portfolio_mapping WHERE portfolio_id = 201) AND property_type = 'Apartment';
